/usr/bin/c++   -std=c++11 -pthread -lboost_thread -g   CMakeFiles/Boost_Echo_Client.dir/src/connectionHandler.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Boost_Echo_Client.dir/src/echoClient.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Boost_Echo_Client.dir/src/input.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Boost_Echo_Client.dir/src/output.cpp.o  -o Boost_Echo_Client /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_system.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_filesystem.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_thread.so -lpthread /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_chrono.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_date_time.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_atomic.so
